info.name: Dating Backend API v1 - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for Dating Backend application with X-API-KEY authentication, boost system with dynamic durations, and all endpoints properly configured.

Important Authentication Fields:
- device_token: Required for all auth endpoints - unique device identifier
- provider: Required field - values: 'email' for email auth, 'phone' for phone auth, 'google', 'facebook', 'apple' for social auth

item.name: Sign Up
item.description: Register a new user account. Required fields: device_token (unique device identifier), provider (email/phone/google/facebook/apple).

item.name: Sign In
item.description: Login with email and password. Required fields: device_token (unique device identifier), provider (email/phone/google/facebook/apple).

item.name: Sign In With Phone
item.description: Login with phone number and OTP. Required fields: device_token (unique device identifier), provider (should be 'phone').

body.raw:
{
    "name": "John Doe",
    "bio": "Adventure seeker, coffee enthusiast, and dog lover. Looking for someone to explore the city with and share meaningful conversations.",
    "gender": "male",
    "date_of_birth": "1995-08-15",
    "age": 28,
    "height": 180,
    "religion_id": 1,
    "relationship_status_id": 1,
    "ethnicity_id": 1,
    "education_id": 3,
    "carrer_field_id": 2,
    "latitude": "40.7128",
    "longitude": "-74.0060",
    "address": "New York, NY, USA",
    "country_code": "+1",
    "phone": "1234567890",
    "search_radius": 50,
    "search_preference": "female",
    "preffered_age": "22-35",
    "relation_goals": [1, 2],
    "interests": [1, 5, 8, 12, 15],
    "languages": [1, 2],
    "alkohol": "drink_socially",
    "smoke": "dont_smoke",
    "is_zodiac_sign_matter": false,
    "is_food_preference_matter": true,
    "activities": ["hiking", "photography", "traveling"],
    "food_drinks": ["coffee", "wine", "italian_food"],
    "sport": ["football", "basketball", "swimming"],
    "games": ["chess", "video_games"],
    "music": ["rock", "jazz", "pop"],
    "films_books": ["action_movies", "sci_fi", "biography"]
}

query.description: ios or android - Shows boost packages with dynamic durations (30, 60, 120 minutes)

exec: // Enhanced auto-extract access token from various response structures
// Extract access_token from different possible locations
console.log('✅ Access token automatically saved: ' + accessToken.substring(0, 20) + '...');
// Auto-extract user_id from various response structures
console.log('✅ User ID automatically saved: ' + userId);

variable.description: Base URL for the Dating Backend API
X-API-KEY for request authentication - required for all endpoints
JWT Access Token from login/signup - automatically populated
Current user ID - automatically populated from user profile
Target user ID for interactions and testing
